alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Putnam, southeastern Defiance, southeastern Paulding, eastern Van Wert and northwestern Allen Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Payne to near Van Wert to near Ohio City. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delphos, Ottoville, Kalida, Continental, Elida and Lima. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Defiance; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert
